column2: geom_raster(data = predictions, aes(x = x, y = y, fill = thresh_prev)) +
ggtitle("GLM - Presence-Absence Map for Hooded Warbler (Threshold = 0.2)") +
ggsave(binary_map2, filename = here("Lab6_SDMs_correlative", "maps", "warbler_pres-abs_threshPrev.png"), dpi = 150, units = c('in'), width = 10, height = 6)
